titleStmt.title: Llyfr gweddi gyffredin, a gwenidogaeth y sacramentau, a chyn[neddfau a] ceremoniau eraill yn Eglwys Loegr.
Book of common prayer. Welsh
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: gan Bonham Norton, a Iohn Bill [printwr i Ardder]choccaf Fawrhydi y Brenin.,

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 165β); head- and tail-pieces, initials.
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text from t.p.; bracketed material conjectured from other eds.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
